getProgressColor().Description: Returns the primary color for the progress bar. If no color was set, transparent is returned.

Returns: A ViewHolder for the Row's View.
Parameters: ViewGroup: The parent View for the Row's view holder.
createRowViewHolder(android.view.ViewGro.Description: Called to create a ViewHolder object for a Row. Subclasses will override this method to return a different concrete ViewHolder object.

getDefaultSeekIncrement().Description: Get default seek increment if @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackSeekDataProvider_E@ is null.

getOnActionClickedListener().Description: Returns the listener for @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Action_E@ click events.

setDefaultSeekIncrement(float).Description: Set default seek increment if @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackSeekDataProvider_E@ is null.

setProgressColor(int).Description: Sets the primary color for the progress bar. If not set, a default from the theme will be used.

ClassDesc: A PlaybackTransportRowPresenter renders a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ to display a series of playback control buttons. Typically this row will be the first row in a fragment such as the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#PlaybackSupportFragment_E@. The detailed description is rendered using a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Presenter_E@ passed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter#setDescriptionPresenter_E@. This can be an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractDetailsDescriptionPresenter_E@. The application can access the detailed description ViewHolder from @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter#ViewHolder#getDescriptionViewHolder_E@.
